title: Poser - Millennium Centaurs & Horse Update
description:
This is a minor update to orignal "Poser - Millennium Centaurs" upload. M4 centaur update, horse armor, horse Charger morph and H3/V3 instructions. Check images included or forum for more renderings, read list below.


Millennium Centaur M4 update = http://forum.daz3d.com/viewtopic.php?t=89730&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=680

Daz3d - Charger Fantasy Tack

DAZ3D - Charger Horse

DAZ3D - Charger Maps

Digiport - Wild Frontier Charger Poses

Gordana - SpineBender and Astral Armor Texture 2

Luthbel - High Elves Riders of the Sun

Ravnheart - Millennium Horse - Dragon Lord Horse1

Ravnheart - Millennium Horse - Dragon Lord Horse2

Ravnheart - SpineBender and Astral Armor Bender Textures

Ravnheart - SpineBender and Astral Armor Textures

ToxicAngel - SpineBender and Astral Armor


My wishlist:

Val3dArt - Next Door: Nights for GND2

TonyBaas - SuperYacht NorthStar

TonyBaas - Cruise Ship Poseidon

TonyBaas - Yacht Susanna

Daz3D - Michael 2.0 (needed for an upload I found, you will love this one)


All files have been tested in Poser 7 SR3 and scanned with AntiVir Personal 8.2

Arichives are '.rar' files create with WinRAR 8.0, a free alternative program is IZArc

Beginning in Feburary I will start testing on Windows 7 Beta, time to retire Windows XP
